_ApplicationName.comment: The product name, shown in the window title and tray
_ApplicationNamePreview.comment: The product name, shown in the window title and tray - on the Insiders Preview builds
_Menu.comment: Application menu on top of the application containing standard submenus (File, Edit, View, ...)

Menu._AboutSkypeLabel.comment: Label for a menu item that opens an About page - containing application version, copyright notices, etc.
Menu._CheckForUpdatesLabel.comment: Label for a menu item that forces the application to check for updates.
Menu._PreferencesLabel.comment: Label for a menu item that opens the preferences panel on Mac.
Menu._ServicesLabel.comment: Label for a menu item that contains a list of macOS Services that the application supports.
Menu._HideSkypeLabel.comment: Label for a menu item that hides the application window.
Menu._HideOthersLabel.comment: Label for a menu item that hides windows of other applications.
Menu._ShowAllLabel.comment: Label for a menu item that shows all windows of the applications.
Menu._SignOutLabel.comment: Label for a menu item causing the user to be signed out from the application.
Menu._QuitSkypeLabel.comment: Label for a menu item that quits the application.
Menu._ViewProfileLabel.comment: Label for menu to navigate to this user's profile.
Menu._NewCallLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening a New call dialog.
Menu._NewGroupChatLabel.comment: Label for a menu item creating a new group chat.
Menu._New1on1ChatLabel.comment: Label for a menu item creating a new 1-1 chat.
Menu._FileLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening the File submenu.
Menu._QuitLabel.comment: Label for a menu item that quits the application.
Menu._EditLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening the Edit submenu.
Menu._UndoLabel.comment: Label for a menu item causing undo operation when editing text.
Menu._RedoLabel.comment: Label for a menu item causing redo operation when editing text.
Menu._CutLabel.comment: Label for a menu item causing cut operation when editing text.
Menu._CopyLabel.comment: Label for a menu item causing copy operation when editing text.
Menu._PasteLabel.comment: Label for a menu item causing paste operation when editing text.
Menu._PastePlainLabel.comment: Label for a menu item causing paste as a plain text operation when editing text.
Menu._SelectAllLabel.comment: Label for a menu item causing selection of all text in currently edited text box.
Menu._SearchSkypeLabel.comment: Label for a menu item navigating to contacts and history search.
Menu._AddToDictionaryLabel.comment: Label for a menu item that adds misspelled word to system dictionary
Menu._ViewLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening the View submenu.
Menu._ToggleFullScreenLabel.comment: Label for a menu item causing the application to open in full screen mode.
Menu._ActualSizeLabel.comment: Label for a menu item causing the application zoom level to be set to a default value, resulting in rendering it in a default size.
Menu._ZoomInLabel.comment: Label for a menu item causing the application zoom level to be increased, resulting in making the interface bigger.
Menu._ZoomOutLabel.comment: Label for a menu item causing the application zoom level to be reduced, resulting in making the interface smaller.
Menu._WindowLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening the Window submenu.
Menu._MinimizeLabel.comment: Label for a menu item causing the application to be minimized to the task bar.
Menu._CloseLabel.comment: Label for a menu item causing the application to be closed, but stay in the tray bar.
Menu._BringAllToFrontLabel.comment: Label for a menu item that brings all windows of the applications to the front.
Menu._NextConversationLabel.comment: Label for menu item that navigates to next conversation in the conversations list
Menu._PreviousConversationLabel.comment: Label for menu item that navigates to previous conversation in the conversations list
Menu._ToolsLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening the Tools submenu.
Menu._UseForSkypeLinksLabel.comment: Label for a toggleable menu item switching the setting that causes the app to react when opening links starting with skype:// are opened by the system. Such links can link to a Skype user profile or a Skype conversation.
Menu._LaunchAtLogin.comment: Label for a toggleable menu item switching the setting that causes the app to autolaunch whenever user logs in
Menu._SettingsLabel.comment: Label for a menu item that opens the settings panel.
Menu._AudioVideoSettingsLabel.comment: Label for a menu item that opens the Audio and Video settings panel. If you include '&' make sure to use double - '&&'.
Menu._ExportHistoryLinuxLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening a tool for exporting chat history on Linux
Menu._ExportHistoryLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening a tool for exporting chat history on Windows and Mac
Menu._HelpLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening the Help submenu.
Menu._LearnAboutSkypeLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening the skype.com webpage in an external browser.
Menu._GoToStatusLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening the Skype Status (former Heartbeat) webpage in an external browser.
Menu._GoToSupportLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening the application support webpage in an external browser.
Menu._AskTheSkypeCommunityLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening the application Skype Commmunity forum in an external browser.
Menu._ThirdPartyNoticesLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening the third party notices.
Menu._ServiceAgreementLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening the Terms of Use statement.
Menu._PrivacyStatementLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening the Privacy and Cookies statement.
Menu._ReportProblemLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening the problem reporting dialog.
Menu._DebugLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening the Debug submenu.
Menu._EnableLoggingLabel.comment: Label for a menu item enabling collection of application logs.
Menu._DisableLoggingLabel.comment: Label for a menu item disabling collection of application logs.
Menu._ReloadLabel.comment: Label for a menu item reloading the application.
Menu._ToggleDeveloperToolsLabel.comment: Label for a menu item opening the developer tools.
Menu._NextConversationLabel.comment: Label for Next Conversation keyboard shortcut
Menu._PreviousConversationLabel.comment: Label for Previous Conversation keyboard shortcut

DisableLogCollection.Title: Diagnostic and error reports
DisableLogCollection._Title.comment: Title for a dialog displayed when the user wants to disable application logging
DisableLogCollection.Message: Reports will no longer be collected until you re-enable them. Are you sure you want to disable diagnostic and error reports? You can find all logs in folder {logsPath}
DisableLogCollection._Message.comment: Message for a dialog displayed when the user wants to disable application logging

EnableLogCollection.Title: Diagnostic and error reports
EnableLogCollection._Title.comment: Title for a dialog displayed when the user wants to enable application logging
EnableLogCollection.Message: Troubleshoot issues you have with Skype by sending diagnostic and error reports to Microsoft. These reports are used to diagnose problems but may contain personal information such as your name and profile details. It is recommended that you turn off these reports after you’ve finished troubleshooting your issue as reports are continuously collected in the background. You can find all logs in folder {logsPath}
EnableLogCollection._Message.comment: Message for a dialog displayed when the user wants to enable application logging

ExporterDialog.ExportingError: Oops, there was an error while exporting your chat history
ExporterDialog._ExportingError.comment: Text shown when exporting conversation history fails
ExporterDialog._ErrorDetails.comment: Title for block with error details
ExporterDialog._ProfilesScreenHeader.comment: Screen title for the conversation history exporter
ExporterDialog.ProfilesScreenExplanation: Hey, we found the following profiles on your computer:
ExporterDialog._ProfilesScreenExplanation.comment: Label for a list of found accounts to be exported
ExporterDialog.ProfilesScreenCallToAction: Select the profile for which you want to export the history and click the "Next" button.
ExporterDialog._ProfilesScreenCallToAction.comment: Description of what to do to export conversation history. The Next button refers to ExporterDialog.NextButton label.
ExporterDialog.NoProfilesFound: We didn't find any previous Skype installation to export chat history from.
ExporterDialog._NoProfilesFound.comment: Message shown when we didn't find any profile from previous version of Skype
ExporterDialog._NextButton.comment: Button label to continue to the conversation history export
ExporterDialog._CloseButton.comment: Button label to close the exporter window
ExporterDialog._OpenButton.comment: Button label to open exported converstaion history files in system's web browser
ExporterDialog._ProgressScreenHeader.comment: Screen title when the hisotry export is in progress. Progress bar with percentage shown under the title.
ExporterDialog._FinalScreenHeader.comment: Screen title when the hisotry export completed the operation successfully
ExporterDialog.FinalScreenExplanation: Exported chat history is located here:
ExporterDialog._FinalScreenExplanation.comment: Message points to a location on system, where are the exported history files

TrayIcon._OpenSkypeLabel.comment: Label displayed after clicking on the tray icon that causes the app to be focused.
TrayIcon._SignOutLabel.comment: Label displayed after clicking on the tray icon that causes the user to be signed out
TrayIcon._QuitSkypeLabel.comment: Label displayed after clicking on the tray icon that causes the app to be closed.
TrayIcon._OnlineStatusLabel.comment: Title for the menu that lets users set their user presence status.
TrayIcon._OnlineLabel.comment: Label for the Active user presence option.
TrayIcon._DoNotDisturbLabel.comment: Label for Do-not-disturb user presence option.
TrayIcon._InvisibleLabel.comment: Label for Invisible user presence option.
TrayIcon._AwayLabel.comment: Label for Away user presence option.
TrayIcon._SingedInStatusLabel.comment: Status message shown when hover over the tray icon.
TrayIcon._UnreadMessageLabel.comment: Unread conversation label when hover over the tray icon.
TrayIcon._SingedOutStatusLabel.comment: Status message shown when hover over the tray icon.

Installer.OpenStore: Please install Skype from the Microsoft Store for the best experience.
Installer._OpenStore.comment: Text shown in Installer's dialog box when trying to install new Skype on Windows 10, where the user needs to go to Microsoft Store and download UWP Skype application

ScreenSharingToolbar._SharingStatusScreen.comment: Text shown on screen sharing toolbar on the shared screen.
ScreenSharingToolbar._SharingStatusWindow.comment: Text shown on screen sharing toolbar when user is sharing a window.
ScreenSharingToolbar._RequestingControlStatus.comment: Text shown on screen sharing toolbar when a remote participant is requesting to gain control of the shared screen.
ScreenSharingToolbar._SharingControlStatus.comment: Text shown on screen sharing toolbar when a remote participant has been given control of the shared screen.
ScreenSharingToolbar._Stop.comment: Text for Stop Sharing button to stop screen sharing.
ScreenSharingToolbar.StopTooltip: Stop Sharing your screen or application
ScreenSharingToolbar._StopTooltip.comment: Text for tooltip for Stop Sharing button.
ScreenSharingToolbar.GrantControlTooltip: Give control of your screen over to a participant on the call
ScreenSharingToolbar._AcceptControl.comment: Text for Accept button to accept a screen sharing control request.
ScreenSharingToolbar.AcceptControlTooltip: Accept the request for control made by {viewer_display_name}
ScreenSharingToolbar._AcceptControlTooltip.comment: Text for tooltip for accept button.
ScreenSharingToolbar._DenyControl.comment: Text for Deny button to deny a screen sharing control request.
ScreenSharingToolbar.DenyControlTooltip: Deny the request for control made by {viewer_display_name}
ScreenSharingToolbar._DenyControlTooltip.comment: Text for tooltip for deny button.
ScreenSharingToolbar._TerminateControl.comment: Text for Revoke Control button to no longer allow any viewer to control the screen.
ScreenSharingToolbar.TerminateControlTooltip: Revoke the permission for {viewer_display_name} to control your screen
ScreenSharingToolbar._TerminateControlTooltip.comment: Text for tooltip for Revoke Control button.
